review:
My baby had fever and jaundice. I went to Dr.Avani and she then diagnosed the condition with less investigations and quickly . My baby is now doing very well. I could see the response of the medication she has given by the evening on the same day. Thank you so much mam . 
The hospital staff is very friendly and the accessibility is very easy .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had taken video consultation for my 10 year old daughter. Felt she was in hurry to finish the consultation. Had to remind multiple times in chat to post the prescription which she mentioned in the call. May be for the same reason I had to use my multiple follow ups and then I could not consult her as the consultation was closed. Even Practo app was throwing error when tried to open chat with her. Never felt this bad when consulting a doctor. It may be different if we visit directly but surely not through video consultation.
reply_text:
I think sir after this review .u called me n said baby was doing ok.now fever reduced every thing was gud.

I never compromise in babies treatment. 
Even followups I responded.

review: Doctor has spent hardly 3 mins on the video call with the patient having fever, cold, cough and throat problem. She advised cbp, cue and crp. Looking at the blood reports, even though platelets were in range, she advised for dengue test. Crp was 44, she asked for typhoid test. I was sending her messages but she never called back or discussed after that.
reply_text:
Hi 
As platelets are decreased than normal limits but in range ..n crp is high wbc decreased it goes in direction for dengue or typhoid.
How can u say like that..ordering tests is also a problem with doctors in India. 
U need to go to US .just to prescribe a proper medicine accurate diagnostics are important. 
I never ordered to many tests as he is looking sick I ordered tests n seeing platelets decreased I ordered for dengue n typhoid
